animeTitle: Your Turn to Chase After Me
otherNames: Chong Sheng Nuan Hun Qing Qing Chong
synopsis: Mo Shi Yi is a talented girl, whose dream is making a lot of money daily, marrying a handsome and rich guy, and stepping on the peak of life. But she loved him so much that she began to lose herself, and then, got a tragic end before rebirth... This life, the only things she wants are money and revenge. Who is that man? She doesn't care. However, why did he become so persistent? Chasing after her all the time!
